Rexxar.name: Spirit Swoop
Rexxar.description: Deal 141 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line, slowing them by 30% for 2 seconds.

Rexxar.name: Misha, Charge!
Rexxar.description: Misha charges in a line, dealing 59 (+4% per level) damage and stunning enemies for 1.25 seconds.

Rexxar.name: Mend Pet
Rexxar.description: Heal Misha for 596 (+4% per level) Health over 5 seconds.

Rexxar.name: Unleash the Boars
Rexxar.description: Release a herd of boars that track down all enemy Heroes in a direction, dealing 110 (+4% per level) damage, revealing, and slowing enemies by 40% for 5 seconds.

Rexxar.name: Bestial Wrath
Rexxar.description: Increases Misha's Basic Attack damage by 150% for 12 seconds.

Rexxar.name: Misha, Focus!
Rexxar.description: Passive: Misha gains 15% move speed. Command Misha to attack a specific enemy or move to a point and wait. Targeting Rexxar commands Misha to retreat to his position, gaining 30% move speed until she reaches Rexxar. Targeting Misha commands her to hold her current position.

1.name: Bird of Prey
1.description: Increases Spirit Swoop's damage by 150% to Minions.

1.name: Easy Prey
1.description: Increases Misha's damage to Minions and Mercenaries by 150%, and Misha gains 50 Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing damage taken by 50%.

1.name: Flare
1.description: Fire a flare at an area, revealing it for 20 seconds.

4.name: Animal Husbandry
4.description: Rexxar and Misha gain 2 Maximum Health every second Rexxar remains alive. These bonuses are lost on Rexxar's death.

4.name: Grizzled Fortitude
4.description: Every 7 seconds, Rexxar and Misha gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%. Stores up to 2 charges. Both Rexxar and Misha have their own charges.

4.name: Hungry Bear
4.description: Misha's Basic Attacks heal her for 4.5% of her maximum Health.

4.name: Hunter-Gatherer
4.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Rexxar's Health Regeneration by 1.25 per second, up to 25 per second.  Reward: After gathering 20 Globes, Rexxar and Misha gain 10 Armor.

7.name: Aspect of the Beast
7.description: Misha's Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Misha, Charge! by 1.25 seconds.

7.name: Crippling Talons
7.description: Increases Spirit Swoop's slow amount to 50% and its duration to 3 seconds.

7.name: Taking Flight
7.description: Increases Spirit Swoop's range by 20%. If Spirit Swoop hits an enemy Hero, the Mana cost is refunded and its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

10.name: Bestial Wrath
10.description: Increases Misha's Basic Attack damage by 150% for 12 seconds.

10.name: Unleash the Boars
10.description: Release a herd of boars that track down all enemy Heroes in a direction, dealing 110 (+4% per level) damage, revealing, and slowing enemies by 40% for 5 seconds.

13.name: Aspect of the Hawk
13.description: When Spirit Swoop hits an enemy Hero, Rexxar gains 125% Attack Speed for 3 seconds. Misha's Basic Attacks increase the duration of this buff by 0.75 seconds.

13.name: Dire Beast
13.description: Rexxar and Misha's Basic Attacks increase the damage of the next Misha, Charge! by 40%, stacking up to a 400% bonus.

13.name: Wildfire Bear
13.description: Misha deals 28 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

16.name: Feign Death
16.description: Fake your death, becoming Invulnerable and untargetable for 5 seconds. During this time you control Misha.

16.name: Primal Intimidation
16.description: Heroes and Summons that attack you or Misha have their Attack Speed slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds. Activate to slow the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of nearby Heroes and Summons near Rexxar and Misha for 2.5 seconds.

16.name: Thrill of the Hunt
16.description: Your Basic Attacks increase both you and Misha's Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds.

20.name: Frenzy of Kalimdor
20.description: Your Basic Attacks deal 10% more damage, and Misha's Basic Attacks slow the target by 20% for 1.25 seconds.

20.name: Hardened Skin
20.description: You and Misha take 75% less damage for 4 seconds.

20.name: Kill Command
20.description: Unleash the Boars deals 50% more damage and roots for 1.5 seconds.

20.name: Spirit Bond
20.description: Increases the duration of Bestial Wrath by 50% and Misha's Basic Attacks heal Rexxar for 50% of her damage dealt during Bestial Wrath.
